Repack Features

  • Based on Truck.Life-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-truck.life.iso (3,470,753,792 bytes)
  • 3 DLCs (Gansu Province, Special items, TaiWan) are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.2 to 1.7 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-5 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

This a brand new truck simulation game, players will experience fun from a variety of truck driving. Drive around the original Chinese map, complete hundreds of specialty tasks through different cities. Meet in the mountains, rivers, lakes and seas. Come to share your truck life.

Game Features

  • Real driving experience. From the convenient light truck to the handsome heavy semi, experience the different truck driving fun.
  • Highly restored map scene. Huge scale of map and cities, and present the original Chinese map and cities.
  • Dynamic weather, seasonal changes, real-time lighting. Based on the real simulated dynamic weather system, the climate changes in different latitude and longitude, and the scene changes in different seasons
  • Dynamic logistics system. Hundreds of specialty tasks, simulated cargo system which based on the city, time and season.
